title: The Bride
summaries: The Bride is a zombie variant that appears during a Blood Moon or very rarely at any time in a Graveyard(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) biome. She acts the same as normal zombies, slowly walking towards the player to deal contact damage, while attempting to navigate around obstacles and opening doors if they are in the way. She has greater health than most other zombies, and is dressed in a traditional bride's outfit, which she can drop in the form of the Wedding Veil and Wedding Dress.
She does not have any variants, nor does she have an Armed variation in Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). The Groom is her marriage counterpart.

She is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades. The Bride requires 10 kills to be awarded completion of her <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
